user_query: very good wow you like it very you very impressive well do you want to see your room sure this is my room look at that television i know what's the matter [Music] you want me to get that no dad just leave it it's fine please leave me a message look i need the apartment back sooner than i thought so call me yeah you look tired would you be okay with that yeah i'm thinking of flying you never fly remember when your mother taught you how to eat spaghetti yep sometimes i pick up the phone to dial her number and then i remember the number's still the same and i'm still on the other end yes i don't know what it is with you kids i'd say hello you'd say hi dad mom there she was a good listener you were a good talker you pushed us pretty hard that's not true i i didn't all feel that way did you david felt it the most he so never wanted to leave down couldn't have said it you turned out okay i don't know dad look at you you were gifted nobody pushed you what did you want to be when you were my age i just wanted to hold down a job but when you guys came along things were different all i want to do is just be a good father that's all i'll come visit you wanna go seoul around the same table i have to give it to each of you i will bring keep asking myself why you all lied to me amy jeff wore the same shirt to work he doesn't live with you anymore does he there's another woman that's why jack hates me man tom came over to me at this they want to make an impression didn't he i want to know
